Table of Contents

Name

glStencilMask - control the writing of individual bits in the stencil

planes

C Specification

void glStencilMask( GLuint mask ) 


 eqn not supported


Parameters






mask 


Specifies a bit mask to enable and disable
writing of individual bits in the stencil planes. Initially, the mask is
all 1's. 





Description

glStencilMask controls the writing of individual bits
in the stencil planes. The least significant $n$ bits of mask, where $n$
is the number of bits in the stencil buffer, specify a mask. Where a 1 appears
in the mask, it's possible to write to the corresponding bit in the stencil
buffer. Where a 0 appears, the corresponding bit is write-protected. Initially,
all bits are enabled for writing. 

Errors

GL_INVALID_OPERATION is generated
if glStencilMask is executed between the execution of glBegin and the corresponding
execution of glEnd. 

Associated Gets

glGet with argument GL_STENCIL_WRITEMASK


glGet with argument GL_STENCIL_BITS 

See Also

glColorMask(3G)
, glDepthMask(3G)
,
glIndexMask(3G)
, glStencilFunc(3G)
, glStencilOp(3G)
